entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Temperature rising to 17 this evening then falling. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers late this evening and after midnight then partly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating after midnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight then becoming light after midnight. Temperature rising to 17 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 10:46 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
